trainers.name: Lorelei
trainers.notes: First member of the Elite Four. Uses Super Potions

trainers.name: Bruno
trainers.notes: Second member of the Elite Four. Uses X Defends

trainers.name: Agatha
trainers.notes: Third member of the Elite Four. Uses Super Potions

trainers.name: Lance
trainers.notes: Fourth member of the Elite Four. Uses Hyper Potions

trainers.name: Rival
trainers.notes: Champion of the Elite Four. Elemental 1 is one of Exeggutor, Gyarados, or Arcanine, whichever is the same type as the player's starter. Elemental 2 is one of Exeggutor, Gyarados, or Arcanine, whichever is weak against the player's starter. Uses Full Restores

trainers.name: Rival
trainers.notes: Champion of the Elite Four. Pretending Fire > Electric, Elemental 1 is one of Ninetales, Magneton, or Cloyster, whichever is weak against the rival's starter. Elemental 2 is one of Ninetales, Magneton, or Cloyster, whichever is super-effective on the rival's starter.
